text: EFCC Invades A Company, Vandalize Their Containers And Equipment In Bayelsa EFCC Invades A Company, Vandalize Their Containers And Equipment In Bayelsa Sunday, April 16, 2017 Crime , news , politics The Economic and Financial Crime Commission, EFCC according to a Facebook user @ Azibaola Robert, invaded a company in Bayelsa State and vandalized everything on their way, including company equipment, containers as so fort. It is believed that EFCC is acting on anonymous whistle-blower tip off but apparently, it didn't yield any results this time. Mr. Robert, who is the Managing Director of Kakatar Construction and Engineering Company wrote this on his Facebook wall: More pics below... EFCC Invades A Company, Vandalize Their Containers And Equipment In Bayelsa Reviewed by Exlink Lodge on Sunday, April 16, 2017 Rating: 5 Share This:
